bio_section.body:
Bio

I am a chemistry educator and science communicator focused on building curiosity-first learning experiences. My work blends classroom practice, lab safety, and public storytelling to help students and audiences connect with science in meaningful ways.

Across schools and community programs, I create clear, engaging materials that move from fundamentals to real-world application. I am especially interested in inquiry-based labs, student-centered assessment, and accessible science communication.
